text.summary: Ogow meesha laga codeeyo, waxa ku qoran warqaddaada codbixinta, iyo ka badanâ€¦

about.title: Ku Saabsan Macluumaadka Qlabka Codbixinta
about.content: Mashruuca Macluumaadka Codbixinta (The Voting Information Project (VIP)) waxaa shaqadiisu tahay in uu ku xiro codbixiyayaasha macluumaadka muhiimka ah ee loo baahan yahay si ay codkooda u dhiibtaan, sida meesha laga codeeyo iyo waxa ku qoran warqaddaada codbixinta.  Waa mashruuc ka dhexeeya The Pew Charitable Trusts, Google, iyo gobolada.  Waxaa la bilaabay 2008, VIP waxay la shaqaysaa gobolada iyo saraakiisha doorashada ee deegaanka si ay u siiso muwaadiniinta macluumaad rasmi ah oo ku saabsan doorashada iyadoo u gaarsiisa siyaabo kala duwan, oo ay ka mid yihiin Google Civic Information API.  Macluumaadka Qlabka Codbixinta waa mid ka mid ah siyaabaha badan oo loo sii marsiiyo VIP, tan oo lagu hubinayo in macluumaadka rasmiga ah ee doorashada ay codbixiyayaashu heli karaan Maalinta Doorashada iyo ka hor.

footer.text: Wixii ah macluumaad buuxa oo ka turjumaya waxa hadda jira, la tasho sarkaalka doorashada ee deegaankaaga.

addressNotFound.title: Lama Helin Macluumaadka Doorashada
addressNotFound.text:
Waxaad qortay:

1234 Main St
New York, NY 1000

. Ma helin wax ku saabsan macluumaadka doorashada ee cinwaanka aad qortay. Fadlan hubi si aad u xaqiijiso in aad cinwaanka sax u qortay, la xiriir sarkaal doorashada, ama mar kale isku day marka ay Maalinta Doorashadu soo dhowaato. Waxaa macluumaad la heli doonaa 2 - 4 todobaad doorashada ka hor. Wixii ah macluumaad buuxa oo ka turjumaya waxa hadda jira, la tasho sarkaalka doorashada ee deegaankaaga.

multipleElections.text: Goobtan waxaa ka jira doorashooyin badan

mailInVoting.title: Warqadda codbixinta oo lagu rido sanduukha boostada rasmiga ah ee loogu tallagalay
mailInVoting.text: Cinwaanka diiwaangashan ee aad qortay waxa uu ku yaal  sanduukha boostada rasmiga ah ee loogu tallagalay.  Tan macnaheedu waa in aad warqadda codbixinta ku soo diri karto boosta adiga oo ku ridaya sanduukha rasmiga ah ee loogu talagalay.  Ma rabtaa in aad siiwado raadinta sanduukh boosto oo lagu rido kuna yaal cinwaankaaga diiwaangashan.

resources.summary: Macluumaadka ku saabsan sidii aad u garan lahayd nadaamka doorashooyinka
